name: Macoscope
tagline: Award-winning apps for enterprise and start-up
description:
We're an experienced team of 30+ designers and senior developers that will build your app with you. We have designed, developed and released 60+ apps for iPhone, iPad, OS X, and Android platforms.
Tell us more about your app and the state it's in, and we will come up with the next steps.
We won US design awards in 2013, 2014, 2015 and 2016. Our clients' work has been featured in The Wall Street Journal, TechCrunch, and Fast Company among others.
What You Get
An integrated team of two or more developers, a designer, and a Product Owner will work full-time on your app. Expect daily and weekly meetings, lots of facetime, calls and chats.
Our Process:
The 4 main steps to build your app:
1. Wireframes - We have to start with strategy, so expect many questions regarding your project. Kickoff can take a place in NY, Warsaw or online.
2. High-Fidelity Projects - So we will be on the same page when it comes to app design.
3. Pixel-Perfect Design - Your app needs to be perfect, there is nothing to discuss here.
4. End-To-End Development - Working in Agile methodology we will provide the first results faster.
Based on our experience and know-how we will be able to cherry-pick the steps that apply to your project.
